Desc: Homing weapon that aims for random enemies
Faster projectiles and more max targets
Increased base damage and fire rate
Even more damage and bigger projectile
Fast projectile that bounces from target to target
Spawn an additional projectile and hit another target
More targets hit and projectile speed
Shoots 4 equally spaced projectiles in the cardinal directions.
Each projectile may hit another enemy
Even more damage and attack speed
Shoot walls of fire that deal damage to enemies that stand in it.
Shoot slightly faster and lasts longer
Firewall lasts longer and is larger
